name: pinkary
description: Pinkary is a self-hosted bookmark management system with tagging, notes, and reading mode support. It includes a polished web UI for efficiently organizing links across categories.
features: Bookmark management: Save and organize web links with titles, descriptions, and custom metadata.
Tag system: Apply multiple tags to bookmarks for flexible categorization and filtering.
Reading mode: View saved articles in a clean, distraction-free reading interface.
Full-text search: Search bookmark titles, descriptions, tags, and cached content to find links quickly.
Collections: Group related bookmarks into collections for project-based or thematic organization.
Browser extension: Save bookmarks directly from your browser with one-click integration.
Archive mode: Save full webpage content for offline access and preservation.
Sharing options: Share individual bookmarks or entire collections with public or private links.
Import and export: Transfer bookmarks from browsers or other services using standard formats.
Duplicate detection: Automatically identify and merge duplicate bookmarks to keep collections clean.
Notes and annotations: Add personal notes and highlights to saved bookmarks for future reference.
Mobile responsive: Access and manage bookmarks from any device with an optimized mobile interface.
